By Bladerunner on Friday, September 6, 2002 - 03:08 pm:

two. one for the mock and one for the wracky. You will get the stick for the ghost from the same death that gets you the mock, you just have to wait for master Pabs to visit a few times and upgrade the alter from the death that created the mock.

By Rovest R. Yakuto on Saturday, September 7, 2002 - 01:27 pm:

I used the term Trainer. Like the game uses in the MR1 manual we are deemed "Master Breeder" when we reach the highest rank. In MR2 it states in page 18 "The Master Trainer" when obtaining the highest rank. I no longer have my MR3 manual *the house cat coughed up aslimy hairball on it*. But I prefer the term Rancher because in MR3 you Really are a Rancher since you use 5 differnt ranches.
